name: Microsoft Fluent System Icons
description:
This is a set of the Microsoft Fluent System Icons - used for products across Microsoft. The Fluent System Icons are friendly - including rounded corners, simplified shapes and come in 2 themes: Regular and Filled.


This file also comes with detailed guidance on icon creation.


WHAT'S NEW in v2.28.0:


  • New & updated icons! Check changelog for more.
  • Fixed issue with Creation Tools - Circle 24 Outline
